title.rendered: Air India Reservation Office in TOKYO, Japan

content.rendered:
Air India:
Air India was established in 1932, commenced operations on 29 July 1946. Air India, the premier flight carrier of India is one of the most extensive flight service provider in India. Air India is owned by Air India Limited (Government of India enterprise).
Air India TOKYO Reservation Office Office Address:
Imperial Hotel Tower,
11th floor,
C-5~6,
1-1-1Uchisaiwai-cho,
Chiyoda-ku
Tokyo 100 0011, TOKYO, Japan

Map: View direction here 

Air India Reservation office telephone contact numbers:
Mgr. East Japan :
0081-3-5157-5592
Passenger Sales:
0081-3-51575593
Reservation Offices :
0081-3-35080261
0800-100-0098
(Free within 23wards)
Email: tyomanager@airindia.co.jp
tyosales@airindia.co.jp
tyores@airindia.co.jp
Fax: 0081-3-5080265

Working hours
0900 hrs to 1730 hrs
(Mon – Fri except National Holidays)
Lunch Break:
1200 hrs to 1300 hrs

Map

Official website: http://www.airindia.com/

Air India Online Check-in: www.airindia.com/online check-in

Note: Online Check in begins 48 hours before departure, and up until 90 minutes before your flight’s scheduled departure time.

Check your flight status here: www.airindia.com/flightstatus

Air India baggage services telephone contact numbers:
Mgr. East Japan :
0081-3-5157-5592
Passenger Sales:
0081-3-51575593
Reservation Offices :
0081-3-35080261
0800-100-0098
(Free within 23wards)

Air India Baggage Allowance

View Air India Hand | Cabin baggage, Checked baggage, Excess baggage charges, over weight baggage charges, over size baggage charges in the above link.

Baggage Delayed / Damaged:Baggage Delayed / Damaged- Air India

Baggage lost and found:Baggage lost and found- Air India

Trace your Baggage at Air India: http://www.airindia.com/WorldTracerBaggageTracingSystem.htm

Near-by Airports: Click on airport name to view contact information of the airport: phone number, email, address, timings etc

Tokyo Haneda Airport, Narita International Airport, Ibaraki Airport

View the nearest Air India offices in Japan and the address, phone number, website and more.

  • Air India Agent Office in OSAKA, Japan
  • Air India Agent Office in TOKYO, Japan
  • Air India Airport Office in OSAKA, Japan
  • Air India Airport Office in TOKYO, Japan
  • Air India Cargo Office in OSAKA, Japan
  • Air India Cargo Office in TOKYO, Japan
  • Air India Reservation Office in OSAKA, Japan
  • Air India Reservation Office in TOKYO, Japan

List of Air India Offices

 

Types of Planes / Air craft available with Air India

Total fleet: 107

  • Airbus A319-100
  • Airbus A320-200
  • Airbus A320neo
  • Airbus A321-200
  • Boeing 747-400
  • Boeing 777-200LR
  • Boeing 777-300ER
  • Boeing 787–8
Queries handled by Air India Customer care:
Flight Ticket Booking, Ticket Ticket Cancellation, Flight Ticket Rescheduling, Ok to Board, Visa Services, Online Check-in, Baggage Allowance, Duty Free Allowance, Flight Information, Airport Lounges, Visa Information, In-Flight Meals, Airport Transfers, Missing Luggage, Immigration Services, Valet Parking, Meet and Greet, Flight Wifi, Airport Wifi, In-Flight Entertainment, Airport Facilities, Delayed Flights, Visa on Arrival, First Class, Business Class, Economy Class, Flying Returns

Is there any problem / complaint with reaching the Air India TOKYO Reservation Office Address or Phone number? Please report any issues using the below comment form.

Rate your experience with the Air India TOKYO Reservation Office in Japan: (click on the stars below)
